participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and caring, loves to engage in fun activities.
participant_1.background: I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling. I watch basketball. My mom went crazy when I was three and I have not seen her since. My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week. Unfortunately, my family lives across the country from me.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Creative and hopeful, enjoys a laid-back lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing. My name is Mary and I'm from Colorado. I got my teaching license last year. I like to sit on the couch all day. I hope to one day be happy with myself.

content.text: Great! Just woke up, ready for the week!
Nice! What are you looking forward to?
I'm looking forward to my teaching job, I got my license last year and I'm starting in the fall!
That's so awesome! Congrats! I've always wanted to be a teacher. What do you want to teach?
I want to teach 3rd grade. I love kids and I think it's so important to give them a good foundation for their education.
I love kids too! I have a 6 year old son. He's a handful but he's so cute.
Aw, that's so sweet! I'm sure he's going to love having you as his teacher.
Thanks! Me too. I want to make sure he has a great experience in school.
I'm sure you'll do a great job!
